      • addGroup

        public void addGroup​(BasicGroup group)
        Adds a group to the system. If users in group do not exist, simply does not send to them. If there are no moderators set, the user creating the group becomes the moderator.
        Specified by:
        addGroup in interface UserServiceWithGroups
        Parameters:
        group - - Group.class

      • deleteGroup

        public void deleteGroup​(User sender,
                        BasicGroup group)
        Deletes a group. Checks if the sender is a moderator in the group.
        Specified by:
        deleteGroup in interface UserServiceWithGroups
        Parameters:
        sender - - User sender, stored at user login.
        group - - BasicGroup group to be removed.
        Throws:
        SenderNotAuthorizedException - - If sender is not a moderator.

      • extendUsers

        public void extendUsers​(User sender,
                        User user,
                        BasicGroup group)
        Adds a user. Checks for existence have been performed by the controller. Checking if allowed, and persisting change. Any member can add.
        Specified by:
        extendUsers in interface UserServiceWithGroups
        Parameters:
        sender - - User sender of message, stored at user login.
        user - - User to be added.
        group - - Basic group to be changed.
        Throws:
        SenderNotAuthorizedException - - if sender is not a member.
        UserAlreadyPresentException - - if user is already in the group.

      • extendModerators

        public void extendModerators​(User sender,
                             User user,
                             BasicGroup group)
        Adds a user. Checks for existence have been performed by the controller. Checking if allowed, and persisting change. Any Moderator can add. Adds user as member if not already.
        Specified by:
        extendModerators in interface UserServiceWithGroups
        Parameters:
        sender - - User sender of message, stored at user login.
        user - - User to be added.
        group - - Basic group to be changed.
        Throws:
        SenderNotAuthorizedException - - if sender is not a moderator.
        UserAlreadyPresentException - - if user is already a moderator.

      • removeUser

        public void removeUser​(User sender,
                       User user,
                       BasicGroup group)
        Removes a user. Checks for existence have been performed by the controller. Checking if allowed, and persisting change. Any Moderator can remove. Users can remove themselves.
        Specified by:
        removeUser in interface UserServiceWithGroups
        Parameters:
        sender - - User sender of message, stored at user login.
        user - - User to be added.
        group - - Basic group to be changed.
        Throws:
        SenderNotAuthorizedException - - if sender is not a moderator or deleted user.

      • removeModerator

        public void removeModerator​(User sender,
                            User user,
                            BasicGroup group)
        Removes a moderator. Checks for existence have been performed by the controller. Checking if allowed, and persisting change. Can only remove if sender and moderator. If last moderator removed, group it deleted even if users are present.
        Specified by:
        removeModerator in interface UserServiceWithGroups
        Parameters:
        sender - - User sender of message, stored at user login.
        user - - User to be added.
        group - - Basic group to be changed.
        Throws:
        SenderNotAuthorizedException - - if sender is not a moderator.
